entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 60%
